setupScript.name: setFocusOnButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#alert-trigger').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button, activate the button to trigger the alert.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button, activate the button to trigger the alert.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
